item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: The development paves the way for the next phase of US President Donald Trump's peace plan to get under way.

item.title: Ex-Tory Home Secretary Suella Braverman defects to Reform UK
item.description: The MP was unveiled as Reform's latest recruit by leader Nigel Farage at a rally, bringing the number of the party's sitting MPs to eight.

item.title: Can unfancied Scots be Six Nations contenders?
item.description: Captain Sione Tuipulotu says Scotland must believe they can win the 2026 Six Nations, despite low expectations following a difficult autumn.

item.title: Starmer defends blocking Andy Burnham from by-election run after backlash
item.description: The Manchester mayor had applied to stand as a candidate for the upcoming parliamentary by-election in Gorton and Denton.

item.title: Trump says his administration 'reviewing everything'
item.description: The US president was asked by the Wall Street Journal whether the immigration agent who shot dead a man in Minneapolis had done the right thing.
